name: Hayden Schiff
body:
Hi, I'm oxguy3. Welcome to my GitHub page! Here are some projects I have worked on.

## Web design

### [phpStageManager](https://github.com/oxguy3/phpStageManager)
A work-in-progress web-based theatre management utility

### [Steamblr](http://www.tumblr.com/theme/37486)
A highly customizable theme for Tumblr blogs that was designed to look and feel much like the website for [Steam](http://store.steampowered.com/news), a popular gaming platform

## Minecraft

### [CoolStoryBro](http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/coolstorybro/)
A plugin for Bukkit (Minecraft) servers that can assign random nicknames from a list (the default list consists of about two hundred "bro names", i.e. Edgar Allan Broe, Stephen Brolbert, etc)

### [SurroundFixer](http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1907298-162-surroundfixer-a-fix-to-play-minecraft-across-multiple-monitors-with-eyefinity2d-surround/)
A Minecraft mod that makes the game display properly on a widescreen multiple monitor setup with AMD Eyefinity or NVIDIA 2D or 3D Surruond

### [SignTitles](http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1907022-162-signtitles-a-simple-mod-to-add-custom-formatted-titles-to-signs/)
A simple Minecraft mod that allows you to put basic formatted titles on signs

### [Oxcraft](http://oxcraft.tumblr.com)
A now-inactive custom Minecraft client that added tons of cheats and abilities
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
